alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Chattooga; Dade; Floyd; Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:47AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Catoosa, northwestern Murray, west central Floyd, northern Whitfield, Walker, Dade and Chattooga Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 446 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Hicks Gap State Park to near Fabius to Geraldine, and moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Lafayette, Summerville, Ringgold, Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Rossville, Chickamauga, Trion, Varnell, Lookout Mountain, Tunnel Hill, Cohutta, Chattanooga Valley, La Fayette, Lyerly, Menlo, Center Post, Fairview, and Beaverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Catoosa; Chattooga; Dade; Floyd; Murray; Walker; Whitfield
